page.title: 15THE POPULATION
page.content: The population of the area is about {2500 people.}They live in two main areas; viz. the villages of Buxton and Lammas and the quarters at R.A.F. Coltishall. The rest are scattered across the D_BLOCK. A survey was taken and the following results arrived at from{513}people: {64%}were over 18 years of age,{1.3% were between 16 an 18 years of age and {30%}were under 16 years of age. { 20%}of those in work worked in Norwich,{26%}worked at R.A.F. Coltishall,{22%}were retired people. {9.5%}were born within the D_BLOCK and {42%}in East Anglia. {15%}had been resident for less than one year and{54%}for more than five years. Of the{513}people surveyed{265}were males and{248}were females.
